Contact Details: Statistics and Research Branch The Executive Office Room E4.03 | Castle Buildings | Stormont | Belfast | BT4 3SR Contact: PublicAppointmentsDatabase@executiveoffice-ni.gov.uk Tel: (028) 9052 8222
Description: The Public Appointments Annual Report provides statistics relating to public appointments in Northern Ireland in 2016/17.
Name: Public Appointments Annual Report
Notes: 1 spreadsheet with multiple tables per spreadsheet.  1.5 and 3.5 contain disability information.
Route from landing page to data: Data can be found by clicking on the link under current publications.  Data tables are available in ODS and XLS.
Sizing Notes: Simple table formats however each tab contains a different number of  tables with inconsistencies across the tabs,  table 1.5 and 3.3 contain disability information by numbers and %.  This dataset may be better suited to the labour market family.
